extendedInfo.description: Is a simple comic viewer.Function- Tap, Double Tap, Flick, Pinch In/Out- Bookmark- Save the last page- Save recent file- Share- Page split- Grayscale mode- Brightness- Contrast Supported Formats-  zip, rar, cbr, cbz, jpg, png, gif, bmpSupported system language- Korean, English

reviews.title: Awesome, reliable
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this app on phones and tablets for a while now and never got around to rating it. It\'s always been a great experience. Thanks to the developer.
reviews.author: Randy Sharp

reviews.title: Image is corrupt
reviews.comment: That\'s the message it gives you whenever it can\'t read your files, BUT COMIC BOOK READER CAN READ THE SAME EXACT .CBR FILES. So, I\'m uninstalling this app.
reviews.author: Zakia D

reviews.title: Fantastic app! Just need some additional features.
reviews.comment: Fantastic app so far. I\'d like to suggest adding some additional features to make it easier to use and track comics read.  1. Easier / simpler way of bringing up the main menu 2. Ability to mark comics as read / unread in the selection list (without having to do something like bookmark the page of comic as I have to now).
reviews.author: Grant Anderson

reviews.title: Thanks 5stars app
reviews.comment: Is the best
reviews.author: Dimitrios Roumeliotis

reviews.title: Need tap zoom.
reviews.comment: Only pinch zoom - not good enough. And zoom levels are not retained for each page.
reviews.author: Lord Childe

reviews.title: Ok but
reviews.comment: Its ok but can\'t get back to the  main library with out exitingmthe app.
reviews.author: Benjamin Rowe

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This a must for any comic reader tried others but this one has been the best
reviews.author: Mark Stacey

reviews.comment: Great app. To return to the main menu go to the menu and press \"open\"
reviews.author: Jeremiah Jones

reviews.comment: Really good app
reviews.author: Simone Clarke

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: Loads files great but once your in....your in, no way to get back to the menu.  No thanks will try another comic viewer.
reviews.author: Brad H

reviews.title: Highly recommend.
reviews.comment: Great app. Simple to use with plenty of options. I\'ve used Simple Comic on my computer for years and I\'m glad to see they have a version for android that\'s just as good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love it and use everyday
reviews.comment: BUT i cant access menu at ALL   only if i delete the comics and load new ones i get to see the menu  for now i am reading  a sequential batch of cbrs, so im ok for now would 5 starts  if there was no menu issue
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A great start.
reviews.comment: Very fast and highly recommended... if it works with your files. Pages load much faster than some alternative apps (acv) and the featureset doesn\'t leave me wanting anything. The app does have issues loading all the images from some comic archives that work fine on my PC and other apps.
reviews.author: Mike Zakes

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Love the app, using on my HP Touch pad.  On the latest version, in file explorer it doesn\'t accurately display how far into each comic you\'ve read, but that\'s trivial given everything else. Great job!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great reading experience but...
reviews.comment: the browser is not that good on tablets.  and it really has the need for a software button to access the menus. without a button to change comics, the app is useless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wont work since last update
reviews.comment: Was great until last update now it just keeps reseting itself over and over non stop everytime i start the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not usable on Nexus 7 with JellyBean
reviews.comment: Without a hardware \'menu\' button, can\'t get to menus!  Needs some sort of special triple-tap sequence, or a menu button on the double-tap control panel.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bug in android 4.0.4
reviews.comment: \"Menu\" button has seemingly disappeared and changing books or any setting options are impossible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Top marks for usability and functionality. Simple to use, flexible, fast, love everything about this app
reviews.author: Vedran Lubovac

reviews.title: Can\'t access \"Home Page\" for app?
reviews.comment: I was reading a comic series last night right after I downloaded Simple Comic Viewer and wanted to read another one, but I couldn\'t figure out how to exit the comic I was reading. I tried pressing the back button but it just closed the entire app. If I can\'t read multiple comics than this app is pretty much worthless. If anyone has a solution, please let me know.   Note: Giving it three stars because it\'s a good comic book reader, just that problem.
reviews.author: Mark Jacobo
